Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
45 Ajjhattikaduka
Ajjhattikaduka
64.
196Naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
197Nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
198Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
